dcterms:description: A dataset used for training and evaluating abstractive summarization models, consisting of news articles and their corresponding summaries.
dcterms:title: CNN Dailymail dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset referenced for its use in abstractive text summarization, providing a basis for training models that generate summaries from text.

dcterms:description: A dataset referenced for its innovative approach to summarization using pointer-generator networks, which combines extractive and abstractive methods.
